Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Increases the handling fee paid to dealers or operators of a redemption center
Summary: Increases the handling fee paid to dealers or operators of a redemption center for the redemption of empty beverage containers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the handling fee paid to a dealer or operator of a redemption center for the redemption of empty beverage containers
